meanings.sent1: The missent package ended up at the neighbor's house.
meanings.sent2: The missent letter was returned to the sender.
meanings.sent3: The missent gift caused confusion but was eventually delivered correctly.
meanings.sent4: The missent email took a detour before reaching its final destination.
meanings.sent5: The missent parcel was like a lost traveler in the world of mail.

meanings.sent1: She missent the invitation by mistake.
meanings.sent2: He missent the important document to the wrong department.
meanings.sent3: The magician missent the rabbit to the wrong hat!
meanings.sent4: The mischievous wind missent the kite soaring into the tree.
meanings.sent5: The distracted postman missent the letters in a mix-up.

meanings.definition: Not sent to the intended recipient.
meanings.sent1: The missent message was never read by the recipient.
meanings.sent2: The missent package was redirected to the correct address.
meanings.sent3: The missent love letter was found by someone unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The missent signal wandered aimlessly in the air.
meanings.sent5: The missent invitation missed its mark and landed elsewhere.
